title: Battle Magic
description: From vast armies to single champions, from legions of wizards to sorcerous duels, the original tales included in this volume are the very heart of fantasy. From kingdoms saved by the power of a spell, to magicked weapons that can steal the souls of countless enemies, to lands and peoples destroyed by dark enchantment, here are the adventures to capture your imagination and hold you spellbound till the last blow has been struck, the final victory has been gained.The Strangeness of the Day by Kristine Kathryn RuschLadykiller by Rosemary EdghillThe Jewel and the Demon by Lisanne NormanPrinciples of warfare by John HelfersBattleMagic(tm) for Morons by John DeChancieThe Miracle of Salamis by Lois TiltonAlaric's Gift by Mickey Zucker ReichertRite of Passage by Ed GormanBright Streets of Air by Nina Kiriki HoffmanHell's Bane by Jane LindskoldThe Fatal Wager by Elizabeth Ann Scarborough'Ware the Sleeper by Julie E.
